entry.title: Divine Message, Version 8
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Database of Transcripts/Quotes we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 7.2 was posted on December 9, 2022. The pdf file Divine Message, Version 8 can be viewed and then downloaded at the link Version 8

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

If you are part of some project which has a public platform (such as a web-site) and some Sahaja Yogis or Sahaja Yoginīs involved in that project would like to use parts of the Divine Message (any version), please kindly consider finding a way to refer on that public platform to
https://seven-teams.github.io/divine

We would like to thank all of you who have contributed in various way to the Database of Transcripts/Quotes. For more contributions, ideas, suggestions, and help in any way, please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

I. Primarily aimed at:
Sahaja Yogis, Sahaja Yoginīs and Seekers of Truth.

II. Numerical Data on Divine Message, Version 8:
1. has 19,342 pages (an increment of 693 pages from Version 7);
2. contains 4,717 events started (an increment of 131 from Version 7);
3. contains 299 figures (an increment of 76 from Version 7):
4. contains 114 footnotes (an increment of 13 from Version 7);
4. has a size of 531 mb.

IV. Older and current database versions (the older versions ought to be used only for getting ideas how to correct the new versions or for comparisons)
Divine Message

01. older, Version 7.2 (2022-1209)

Sahaja Digital Library
37. older

V. Your support.
Your kind support for the other teams (Quotes on Incarnations Team, Scriptures Team, and Yearly Topics Team) which have become dynamic would be very much appreciated.

VI. Current study-research flow.
1. Intensive on about 1,391 events with transcripts started.
2. Gradual on the other 3,326 events with transcripts started.
3. Queued on additional 7,834 events among which many hundreds will become events with transcripts.</font>

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Comprehensive Compilations Team (the Divine Message Subteam)

entry.title: Divine Message, Version 7
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Database of Transcripts/Quotes we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 6.1 was posted on April 24, 2022. The pdf file Divine Message, Version 7 can be viewed and then downloaded at the link Version 7

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

If you are part of some project which has a public platform (such as a web-site) and some Sahaja Yogis or Sahaja Yoginīs involved in that project would like to use parts of the Divine Message (any version), please kindly consider finding a way to refer on that public platform to
https://seven-teams.github.io/divine

We would like to thank all of you who have contributed in various way to the Database of Transcripts/Quotes. For more contributions, ideas, suggestions, and help in any way, please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

I. Primarily aimed at:
Sahaja Yogis, Sahaja Yoginīs and Seekers of Truth.

II. Numerical Data on Divine Message, Version 7:
1. has 18,649 pages (an increment of 602 pages from Version 6);
2. contains 4,586 events started (an increment of 171 from Version 6);
3. contains 223 figures and 103 footnotes;
4. has a size of 401 mb.

III. Key features.
20. Reporting of footnotes (besides pages, events, figures)

IV. Older and current database versions (the older versions ought to be used only for getting ideas how to correct the new versions or for comparisons)

31. older

V. Your support.
Your kind support for the other teams (Quotes on Incarnations Team, Scriptures Team, and Yearly Topics Team) which have become dynamic would be very much appreciated.

VI. Current workflow.
1. Intensive work on about 1,097 events with transcripts started.
2. Gradual work on the other 3,489 events with transcripts started.
3. Queued work on additional 7,781 events among which many hundreds will become events with transcripts.
In the last 6 years, the Database of Transcripts/Quotes grew by about 3.5 pages a day (as an average). In particular, for the period 2020-0718 to 2022-0802 the Database of Transcripts/Quotes grew by exactly 3.5 pages a day (as an average). Would be very desirable that this growth will continue for the period 2022-0803 to 2027-0718. Gradually, the file will grow to a number of pages between 26,000 (an increment of 1,000 from Version 3) and 108,000.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Comprehensive Compilations Team (the Divine Message Subteam)

entry.title: Divine Message, Version 5
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Database of Transcripts/Quotes we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 4.3 was posted on June 20, 2021. The pdf file Divine Message, Version 5 is available at the link Version 5

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

If you are part of some project which has a public platform (such as a web-site) and some Sahaja Yogis or Sahaja Yoginīs involved in that project would like to use parts of the Divine Message (any version), please kindly consider finding a way to refer on the public platform to
https://seven-teams.github.io/divine

We would like to thank all of you who have contributed in various way to the Database of Transcripts/Quotes. For more contributions, ideas, suggestions, and help in any way, please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

I. Primarily aimed at:
Sahaja Yogis, Sahaja Yoginīs and Seekers of Truth.

II. Numerical Data on Divine Message, Version 5:
1. has 17,417 pages (an increment of 756 pages from Version 4);
2. contains 4,377 events started (an increment of 89 from Version 4);
3. contains 211 figures (an increment of 33 figures from Version 4);
4. has a size of 361.2 mb.

III. New Key Features.
19. Colored background for text without audio, video or original handwriting started. See 1901-0000 Letter to Rājabhāī Modi and other Sahaja Yogis (Marathi) from Nirmala Yoga, Issue 14 (March-April 1983), Pages 10 and 39 (perhaps London, 1975) on Page 323 as the very first sample. [The background color, as well as the colors for Hindi and Marathi texts (translations), subject to improvements in future versions.]

IV. Older and current database versions (the older versions ought to be used only for getting ideas how to correct the new versions or for comparisons)
